sense.def:
To condescend to people
pomeni vesti se tako, da ljudem pokažemo, kako vzvišene se počutimo nad njimi;

seg.quote: He never condescended, never spoke down to me.
She addressed him with the same condescending tone.
He spoke to the labourers with no condescension.

sense.def:
To condescend to do something
pomeni privoliti, da bomo nekaj naredili, vendar pri tem pokazati, da s tem nekomu delamo uslugo.

seg.quote: She did not condescend to have dinner with him.
